scripts.api-test: newman run cypress/api-tests/saucedemo.postman_collection.json -e cypress/api-tests/saucedemo.postman_environment.json -r htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-title 'SauceDemo API Tests' --reporter-htmlextra-darkTheme true --reporter-htmlextra-showEnvironmentData false --reporter-htmlextra-showFolderDescription false --reporter-htmlextra-showTestScriptData false --reporter-htmlextra-open false
